Token.Abstract: The Beacon Service is used to create, read, update, and delete beacons on ContextHub.
The singleton instance of the CCHBeaconService.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The singleton instance of the CCHBeaconService.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new beacon on the ContextHub server.

Parameter.Name: beaconRegion
Parameter.Abstract: CLBeaconRegion to be added to ContextHub.

Parameter.Name: tags
Parameter.Abstract: (optional) The tags to be applied to the beacon.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: (optional) Called when the request completes. The block is passed an NSDictionary object that represents the beacon. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.

Token.Abstract: Gets a beacon from ContextHub using the beacon Id.

Parameter.Name: beaconId
Parameter.Abstract: The id of the beacon stored in ContextHub.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the request completes. The block is passed an NSDictionary object that represents the beacon. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.

Token.Abstract: Gets beacons from the ContextHub server.

Parameter.Name: tags
Parameter.Abstract: (optional) Tags of the beacons that you are interested in. Passing nil will return beacons without tags.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the request completes. The block is passed an NSArray of NSDictionary objects that represent iBeacons. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.

Token.Abstract: Updates a beacon on the ContextHub server.

Parameter.Name: beacon
Parameter.Abstract: The beacon to be updated on ContextHub.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the request completes. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.

Token.Abstract: Deletes an existing beacon from ContextHub.

Parameter.Name: beacon
Parameter.Abstract: The beacon to be deleted from ContextHub.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the request completes. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.

Token.Abstract: Creates a CLBeaconRegion from a beacon dictionary.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A CLBeaconRegion from a beacon dictionary.
